org.italiangrid.voms.credential.impl
Class VOMSPEMCredential

java.lang.Object
  eu.emi.security.authn.x509.helpers.AbstractDelegatingX509Credential
      org.italiangrid.voms.credential.impl.VOMSPEMCredential
All Implemented Interfaces:
eu.emi.security.authn.x509.X509Credential
public class VOMSPEMCredential
extends eu.emi.security.authn.x509.helpers.AbstractDelegatingX509Credential

This class leverages BouncyCastle support for password finders to route around canl PEMCredential limitations which hide such support. Once this issue is fixed, this class can be removed.

Author:
andreaceccanti
